description: Manage products in your resource group and catalog.

commands.name: az sphere product create
commands.summary: Create a new product in your resource group and catalog.
examples: az sphere product create --resource-group MyResourceGroup --catalog MyCatalog --name MyProduct --description MyDescription
az sphere product create --resource-group MyResourceGroup --catalog MyCatalog --name MyProduct --description MyDescription --no-default-device-groups

commands.name: az sphere product delete
examples: az sphere product delete --resource-group MyResourceGroup --catalog MyCatalog --product MyProduct

commands.name: az sphere product list
commands.summary: List all products in your resource group and catalog.
examples: az sphere product list --resource-group MyResourceGroup --catalog MyCatalog

commands.name: az sphere product show
commands.summary: Show details of a product in your resource group and catalog.
examples: az sphere product show --resource-group MyResourceGroup --catalog MyCatalog --product MyProduct

commands.name: az sphere product update
commands.summary: Update a product's details in your resource group and catalog.
examples: az sphere product update --resource-group MyResourceGroup --catalog MyCatalog --product MyProduct --description MyDescription
